pr_title: [#10347] Fix inconsistency in indicating end of the day

timeline.message: Change usage of time 00:00 to use 23:59

timeline.bodyText: There's a pre-existing bug here that we need to fix; the range should run from 1-24 instead of 1-23
timeline.author: wkurniawan07
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2,7 +2,7 @@
         (ngModelChange)="triggerTimeChange($event)" [disabled]="isDisabled"
         [compareWith]="timeCompareFn"
 >
-  <option *ngFor="let i of range(23)" [ngValue]="{ hour: i, minute: 0 }">
+  <option *ngFor="let i of range(1, 23)" [ngValue]="{ hour: i, minute: 0 }">
